welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Viera West, a charming city known for its beautiful landscapes and friendly community. Get ready to explore and experience all that this wonderful place has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Merritt Island Airport serves all arriving and departing flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Merritt Island Airport is for private and chartered flights only.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Melbourne International Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: Terminal 1 is dedicated to domestic flights operated by major airlines such as Delta, American Airlines, and United.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Terminal 2 is used for international flights and is equipped with customs and immigration facilities.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Space Coast Regional Airport handles all commercial flights and provides a variety of services for travelers.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Space Coast Regional Airport caters to private and corporate aircraft, offering a range of amenities for pilots and passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.
